name: Flight of the phoenix (Laughing Tree)
description:
Flight of the Phoenix is an endless runner where the player controls a phoenix flying through a chasm. 

As the phoenix you have two abilities, Fireball and Flame Dash, these abilities cost a pick up item called “Flames”.

Fireball will destroy the obstacles with a crack on.

Flame Dash you have to push the button to phase through certain objects, falling rocks, boulders and the wall with holes in the wall.

As the theme for this GamesJam was Rebirth, we decided to incorporate a rebirth mechanic. When the player gains 10 coins they are able to revive when they crash, In doing so they will be “reborn” and will lose all coins in their current position.
